backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing customer and invoice storage with CRUD operations and payment tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding-related updates, affected frontend files, and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH color variables defining the app’s light and dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with favicon links and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/api/backendClient.ts: Backend client type import plus a helper to normalize errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable React Query keys for customers and invoices.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for invoices and customers wrapped in theme and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, main content area, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: UI helper component for loading, error, empty, and normal data states.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header displaying the Queen Bee branding with a generated logo image and title text.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Form for creating customers with validation, toast notifications, and mutation handling.
Displays customer list with async loading states and provides a dialog for adding new customers.
React Query hooks for fetching customers, fetching a single customer, and creating new customers with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/customers/types.ts: Defines CustomerFormData and helpers for converting backend customer data to form data.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceDe: Shows detailed invoice info, related customer data, and allows recording payments with validation.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceFo: Form for creating invoices, selecting a customer, editing line items, validating input, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceLi: Editor for invoice line items allowing adding, removing, and updating items with live total calculation.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoicesP: Lists all invoices with status and customer names, provides creation dialog, and handles async loading states.
frontend/src/features/invoices/queries.t: React Query hooks for fetching invoices/customers and creating invoices or recording payments using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/features/invoices/types.ts: Defines invoice form data structures and helper functions for currency formatting, parsing, and total calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark mode UI theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, existing features, and high-level summary of the app’s structure and functionality.
